segments.text: I see the water just pouring out of the sink, and it’s making me so anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely ignoring it, and I don’t understand how.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good, and I’m scared someone’s going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is so unstable, and the boy is standing right on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, like nothing bad could ever happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the floor is going to be a slipping hazard soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, but inside, it’s a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to warn them, but I know they won’t listen.
segments.speaker: PAR
